description:
How could Blanc get mad when the sun's shining and the weather is sweet? Grab the Blanc Swimsuit Outfit and hammer down all the 2D foes!

Note: Players can access the Blanc Swimsuit Outfit by going to the Menu and scrolling to the Equipment section. The Blanc Swimsuit Outfit is purely cosmetic and is visible during battle, cut scenes, and exploration segments with Neptune. Mix-n-match with the animal sets for fun!
name: Blanc Swimsuit Outfit
